recipesJson.name: Banana cream caramel
recipesJson.author: Eirini
recipesJson.description:
A Banana  recipe with caramel and cream. Keep it five days and its ready for vape.
Enjoy <3

reviews.text: well done love this will be in my rotation i recommend you try this ty for sharing

A very nice taste of a creamy banana and caramel comes and gives the necessary note to the whole mix. Even though its just the second attempt of Eirini to make her own recipe my opinion is that he did it pretty well! Give it a try. its smooth and tasty. I personally loved it! Ty Eirini for sharing!
